title: Corporate Lunacy; Behind the Scenes of America's Worst Gas Station, Revised Edition
description: Penalizing managers who sell too much gas? Inappropriate relationships? Discriminatory Practices? It's just another day at the inconvenience stores of "Slowway".The revised edition includes bonus material previously unreleased, including a new final chapter.Join Rob, an accomplished amateur and professional wrestler, as he climbs the ranks of corporate America while he questions the motives of his supervisors.Follow Rob Clooneyfacebook.com/AuthorRobClooneytwitter.com/clooney_rob
author: Rob Clooney
